select t.bid, t.b_name, t.author as aid, t1.name as aname, t1.country, t1.age, t.pub_date, t.pub_house, t.type as type_id, t2.description as tname, t.rectime, t.serial_no, t.remarks from tbl_book t, tbl_author t1, tbl_book_type t2 where t.author = t1.aid and t.type = t2.t_no and t.bid = :bid
insert into tbl_book (bid, b_name, author, pub_date, pub_house, type, serial_no, remarks) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
update tbl_book t set t.b_name = ?, t.author = ?, t.pub_date = ?, t.pub_house = ?, t.type = ?, t.serial_no = ?, t.remarks = ? where t.bid = ?
